definition: one of a series of texts for students learning to read
details:
noun
- one of a series of texts for students learning to read
- a public lecturer at certain universities
= synonyms: lector, lecturer
- someone who reads the lessons in a church service
= synonyms: lector
- someone who reads proof in order to find errors and mark corrections
= synonyms: proofreader
- a person who enjoys reading
- a person who can read
- someone who reads manuscripts and judges their suitability for publication
= synonyms: reviewer, referee
- someone who contracts to receive and pay for a service or a certain number of issues of a publication
= synonyms: subscriber
